attributes.action: ask Camelot to make the lotto jackpot lower and make the lesser wins worth more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that the lottery would be more successful if more money was paid out for lesser wins as in reallity this is where the majority of people really expect to win. i.e 3 numbers - £20-£30 and 4 numbers at least £150
